name: EQ2 Traders - alternate 1
description:
This is an alternate stylesheet for EverQuest II tradeskill compendium located at http://eq2.eqtraders.com/. This stylesheet completely changes the look of the site, adding background and menu images.

Higher quality "before" shot: http://i149.photobucket.com/albums/s62/eq2graphics/hosted/before.jpg
Higher quality "after" shot: http://i149.photobucket.com/albums/s62/eq2graphics/hosted/after.jpg

If you enjoy using this style, please take a moment to rate, comment, and/or donate. :)
